title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8058.01 - Bronx County
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8058.01 - Bronx County

State Regulations
(a) IR 87. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 87 between the IR 95 and the

Bronx-Westchester county line; except that the entire section has operating
limitations during the morning and evening peak traffic periods and usage is
restricted from the left lane. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8058.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
